descriptions.description: A Metalink library written in C language. It is intended to provide the programs written in C to add Metalink functionality such as parsing Metalink XML files.

set.commands:
PACKAGE_NAME=libmetalink PACKAGE_VERSION=0.1.2
oegimport expat # optional oegimport libxml2 # optional oegimport libiconv oegimport gettext oegimport zlib
oegextract ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}.tar.bz2
mkdir -p "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}/packages/${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}" cp AUTHORS COPYING README "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}/packages/${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}/"
configure --prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --with-sysroot=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --with-gnu-ld --bindir=${OEG_BASE_BIN_DIR} --libdir=${OEG_BASE_LIB_DIR} ${CONFIGURE_HOST_PARA} --with-libxml2 # findet libxml2 nicht! make make install-strip DESTDIR=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}
cd "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}"
mv bin/*.dll bin64/ rm -rf bin # TODO: Do we need to edit the .la files in lib64?
oegarchive ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}
